title: Was ‘Coronavirus’ Replaced with ‘Chinese Virus’ in Trump’s Notes?
subtitle: U.S. President Donald Trump has faced criticism for his insistence in referring to COVID-19 as the "Chinese virus."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A photograph posted on social media in March 2020 shows an authentic image of U.S. President Donald Trump's speech notes with the word "Corona" scratched out and replaced in handwriting by "Chinese."
